SourcedStatement: Five years into their foundation work, the Currys announced Thursday a commitment to raise and invest $25 million over the next five years devoted to literacy programs that will provide one-on-one tutoring for children who are at least two grade levels behind in reading.
Name: Eat.Learn.Play. Foundation
Justification: The foundation announced a new commitment to literacy programs.

Name: AP News
Justification: The article includes a link to AP News’ NBA coverage.

SourcedStatement: “Everything happens for a reason and the journey gives you all type of different experiences along the way,” the 36-year-old Curry said Wednesday before hosting a charity golf tournament benefiting the couple’s Eat.Learn.Play. Foundation devoted to Oakland schools.
Name: Stephen Curry
Title: NBA player
Justification: Curry was speaking before hosting a charity golf tournament benefiting the couple’s Eat.Learn.Play. Foundation devoted to Oakland schools.

SourcedStatement: “But this summer’s been amazing, just coming off a tough NBA year to experience what we did and get a win in the Olympics and some of the things I look forward to every year especially around our foundation and the work that we’re doing here in Oakland. ... It puts everything into perspective of what basketball has done for me and the doors that it’s opened and trying to take full advantage of it.”
Name: Stephen Curry
Title: NBA player
Justification: Curry was reflecting on his summer and the work he and his foundation are doing in Oakland.

SourcedStatement: “It’s the same way I appreciate all the things I get to do on and off the court where it’s all connected,” Curry said.
Name: Stephen Curry
Title: NBA player
Justification: Curry was discussing the connection between his on-court achievements and his off-court work.

SourcedStatement: “Me having fun going and winning a gold medal raised the platform to then be able to talk about stuff that matters even more. Being able to share those experiences with my family, the (foundation) team, they know especially while they were working tirelessly every day to make sure a day like today is executed and make sure our plan is locked in, I’m representing everybody out there on the court doing what I do.”
Name: Stephen Curry
Title: NBA player
Justification: Curry was discussing how his Olympic victory has helped raise awareness for his foundation’s work.

SourcedStatement: “What’s interesting is it’s never been a one and done and we’ve always slow rolled things out because we love to build a model that kind of proves itself and can stand on its own,” Ayesha Curry said, acknowledging she observes her own children’s learning styles and how much she wants to support those without the same resources.
Name: Ayesha Curry
Title: Co-founder of Eat.Learn.Play. Foundation
Justification: Ayesha Curry was discussing the foundation’s approach to literacy programs and her personal observations of her children’s learning styles.

SourcedStatement: “Working on it,” Curry said with a smile regarding the trademark before heading off to his golf cart.
Name: Stephen Curry
Title: NBA player
Justification: Curry was discussing the process of trademarking his catchphrase “nuit, nuit.”

SourcedStatement: Those children from Burckhalter Elementary School in Oakland were thrilled to have such a special field trip to Stanford Golf Course.
Name: children
Justification: These students have been part of a pilot tutoring program through the Currys’ foundation that is again expanding its reach in Oakland Unified School District after efforts last year included the revitalization of six schoolyards.
